attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for his service to our country and the NHS
attributes.background: This amazing gentleman has served our country and for his 100th birthday has walked 100 laps of his garden raising over £12 million for our NHS during the Covid-19 pandemic. He should be knighted immediately!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
